languages.text: "Гнев Лилэтан, выплеснутый наружу..." {n}Ирлиэт осекается.{/n} "На протяжении столетий этот мир сопротивлялся зверствам, что учиняли над ним бездушные машины и беспечные создания. Однако то, о чем поведал тебе машинный человек — нечто иное, нечто более страшное. Сама планета противится некому злу, гнездящемуся в ее колыбели".

"The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."
languages.original_text: "Гнев Лилэтан, выплеснутый наружу..." {n}Ирлиэт осекается.{/n} "На протяжении столетий этот мир сопротивлялся зверствам, что учиняли над ним бездушные машины и беспечные создания. Однако то, о чем поведал тебе машинный человек — нечто иное, нечто более страшное. Сама планета противится некому злу, гнездящемуся в ее колыбели".

traits.locale_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For generations, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

"The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For generations, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

"The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For generations, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

"The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

languages.text: “莉莱赞正在表达她的愤怒……”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿。{/n}“许多世纪以来，这个世界一直在反抗那些没有灵魂的机器与没有思想的生物对它施加的暴行。不过，那个机器人告诉你的，却是另一件事情，是某件可怕得多的事情。这颗行星正在与某种已经在它的摇篮中扎根的邪恶力量抗争。”
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

traits.locale_text: “莉莱赞正在表达她的愤怒……”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿。{/n}“许多世代以来，这个世界一直在反抗那些没有灵魂的机器与没有思想的生物对它施加的暴行。不过，那个机器人告诉你的，却是另一件事情，是某件可怕得多的事情。这颗行星正在与某个已经在它的摇篮中扎根的邪恶力量抗争。”

languages.text: «El Lilaethan expresa su ira...». {n}Yrliet hace una pausa.{/n} «Durante siglos, este mundo ha resistido la brutalidad de las máquinas desalmadas y las criaturas despiadadas, pero lo que te ha dicho el hombre máquina... eso es distinto, más aterrador. El planeta se enfrenta a un mal que ha arraigado en su misma cuna».
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

traits.locale_text: «El Lilaethan expresa su ira...». {n}Yrliet hace una pausa.{/n} «Durante generaciones, este mundo ha resistido la brutalidad de las máquinas desalmadas y las criaturas despiadadas, pero lo que te ha dicho el hombre máquina... eso es distinto, más aterrador. El planeta se enfrenta a un mal que ha arraigado en su misma cuna».

languages.text: 「リラエタンが怒りを表している…」{n}ユリエットは間を置く。{/n}「何世紀もの間、この星は魂のない機械と思考のない生物に傷つけられるという残虐行為に耐えてきた。しかし、機械人間があなたに話したこと…それは別の、もっと恐ろしい何かだ。この星は邪悪と闘っている、星の揺りかごに根を伸ばしている邪悪と」
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

traits.locale_text: 「リラエタンが怒りを表している…」{n}ユリエットは間を置く。{/n}「何世紀もの間、この星は魂のない機械と思考のない生物に傷つけられるという残虐行為に耐えてきた。しかし、機械人間があなたに話したこと…それは別の、もっと恐ろしい何かだ。この星は邪悪と闘っている、星の揺りかごに根を伸ばしている邪悪と」

languages.text: "Die Lileath zeigt ihren Zorn ..." {n}Yrliet hält kurz inne.{/n} "Seit Jahrhunderten widersetzt sich diese Welt der Gewalt, die ihr von seelenlosen Maschinen und rücksichtslosen Kreaturen aufgezwungen wird. Aber was der Maschinenmann Euch gesagt hat ... das ist etwas anderes, Furchteinflößenderes. Der Planet bekämpft etwas Böses, das direkt in seiner Wiege Wurzeln geschlagen hat."
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

traits.locale_text: "Lileath zeigt ihren Zorn ..." {n}Yrliet hält kurz inne.{/n} "Seit Generationen widersetzt sich diese Welt der Gewalt, die ihr von seelenlosen Maschinen und rücksichtslosen Kreaturen aufgezwungen wird. Aber was der Maschinenmann Euch gesagt hat ... das ist etwas anderes, Furchteinflößenderes. Der Planet bekämpft etwas Böses, das direkt in seiner Wiege Wurzeln geschlagen hat."

languages.text: « La lilaethan exprime sa colère... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant, puis reprend.{/n} « Pendant des siècles, ce monde a résisté à la brutalité infligée par des machines sans âme et des créatures sans égards. Mais ce dont l'homme mécanique vous a parlé, c'est une chose différente et bien plus effrayante. La planète se bat contre un mal qui s'est enraciné dans son propre cœur. »
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

traits.locale_text: « La lilaethan exprime sa colère... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant, puis reprend.{/n} « Pendant des générations, ce monde a résisté à la brutalité infligée par des machines sans âme et des créatures sans égards. Mais ce dont l'homme mécanique vous a parlé, c'est une chose différente et bien plus effrayante. La planète se bat contre un mal qui s'est enraciné dans son propre cœur. »

languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

languages.text: "Lilaethan'ın öfkesinin bir ifadesi." {n}Yrliet duraksıyor.{/n} "Bu dünya yüzyıllar boyunca ruhsuz makinelerin ve düşüncesiz yaratıkların ona acımasızca vurduğu darbelere direndi. Makine adamın sana söylediği şeyse... O başka, daha korkutucu bir şey. Gezegen, direkt olarak özüne kök salmış bir kötülükle savaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "The Lilaethan is expressing her wrath..." {n}Yrliet pauses.{/n} "For centuries, this world has resisted the brutality inflicted upon it by soulless machines and unmindful creatures. But what the machine man told you — that is something else, something more frightening. The planet is fighting an evil that has taken root in its very cradle."

traits.locale_text: "Lilaethan'ın öfkesinin bir ifadesi." {n}Yrliet duraksıyor.{/n} "Bu dünya yüzyıllar boyunca ruhsuz makinelerin ve düşüncesiz yaratıkların ona acımasızca vurduğu darbelere direndi. Makine adamın sana söylediği şeyse... O başka, daha korkutucu bir şey. Gezegen, direkt olarak özüne kök salmış bir kötülükle savaşıyor."
